ns0:entry.ns0:title: AvaloniaUI/Avalonia
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/AvaloniaUI/Avalonia
Language: c%23
Develop Desktop, Embedded, Mobile and WebAssembly apps with C# and XAML. The most popular .NET UI client technology

ns0:entry.ns0:title: Azure/azure-sdk-for-net
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-net
Language: c%23
This repository is for active development of the Azure SDK for .NET. For consumers of the SDK we recommend visiting our public developer docs at https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet/azure/ or our versioned developer docs at https://azure.github.io/azure-sdk-for-net.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: MudBlazor/MudBlazor
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/MudBlazor/MudBlazor
Language: c%23
Blazor Component Library based on Material Design principles with an emphasis on ease of use and extensibility

ns0:entry.ns0:title: OpenTabletDriver/OpenTabletDriver
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/OpenTabletDriver/OpenTabletDriver

Open source, cross-platform, user-mode tablet driver

ns0:entry.ns0:title: OrchardCMS/OrchardCore
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/OrchardCMS/OrchardCore
Language: c%23
Orchard Core is an open-source modular and multi-tenant application framework built with ASP.NET Core, and a content management system (CMS) built on top of that framework.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: PowerShell/PowerShell
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell
Language: c%23
PowerShell for every system!

ns0:entry.ns0:title: Tichau/FileConverter
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/Tichau/FileConverter
Language: c%23
File Converter is a very simple tool which allows you to convert and compress files using the context menu in windows explorer.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: dotnet/efcore
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/dotnet/efcore
Language: c%23
EF Core is a modern object-database mapper for .NET. It supports LINQ queries, change tracking, updates, and schema migrations.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: dotnet/maui
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/dotnet/maui
Language: c%23
.NET MAUI is the .NET Multi-platform App UI, a framework for building native device applications spanning mobile, tablet, and desktop.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: git-ecosystem/git-credential-manager
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/git-ecosystem/git-credential-manager
Language: c%23
Secure, cross-platform Git credential storage with authentication to GitHub, Azure Repos, and other popular Git hosting services.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: gitextensions/gitextensions
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/gitextensions/gitextensions
Language: c%23
Git Extensions is a standalone UI tool for managing git repositories. It also integrates with Windows Explorer and Microsoft Visual Studio (2015/2017/2019).

ns0:entry.ns0:title: mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG
Language: c%23
mRemoteNG is the next generation of mRemote, open source, tabbed, multi-protocol, remote connections manager.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: microsoft/WinUI-Gallery
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/microsoft/WinUI-Gallery
Language: c%23
This app demonstrates the controls available in WinUI and the Fluent Design System.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: microsoft/garnet
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/microsoft/garnet
Language: c%23
Garnet is a remote cache-store from Microsoft Research that offers strong performance (throughput and latency), scalability, storage, recovery, cluster sharding, key migration, and replication features. Garnet can work with existing Redis clients.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: microsoft/sbom-tool
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/microsoft/sbom-tool
Language: c%23
The SBOM tool is a highly scalable and enterprise ready tool to create SPDX 2.2 compatible SBOMs for any variety of artifacts.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: microsoft/semantic-kernel
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/microsoft/semantic-kernel
Language: c%23
Integrate cutting-edge LLM technology quickly and easily into your apps

ns0:entry.ns0:title: microsoft/testfx
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/microsoft/testfx
Language: c%23
This repository holds the source code of Microsoft.Testing.Platform (MTP), a lightweight alternative to VSTest, as well as MSTest adapter and framework.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: modelcontextprotocol/csharp-sdk
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
